item.text: When did the Jaundice first appear?
Recent Travel to a High Malaria Risk area
Obvious Cause of Fever (to determine if Malaria test required)
No Fast Breathing and No Chest Indrawing (post Inhaled Bronchodilator Trial)

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and ((%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.A.DE24').answer.first().value.code = 'EmCare.A.DE25') or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B21S1.DE01').answer.first().value.code ='yes' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B8-B9.DE01').answer.first().value.code = 'no' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B7.DE02').answer.first().value.code = 'no' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S1.DE02').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S1.DE03' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S1.DE02').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S1.DE04' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S1.DE01').answer.first().value.code = 'no' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S2.DE07').answer.first().value.code = 'no' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S2.DE08').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S2.DE09' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S2.DE08').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S2.DE10') or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value > 2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE07').answer.first().value.code = 'no') or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S2.DE01').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S2.DE02' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B18S2.DE01').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B18S2.DE03' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B19S2.DE01').answer.first().value.code = 'no' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B19S2.DE04').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B19S2.DE05' ) or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value*30.4375 >7 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B21S2.DE01').answer.first().value.code != 'EmCare.B21S2.DE02')) )) or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6  )

item.text: Mother able to wait until young infant is willing to breastfeed again

valueExpression.expression: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE31').answer.first().value.code = 'yes' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE32').answer.first().value.code = 'yes' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE33').answer.first().value.code = 'yes' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE34').answer.first().value.code = 'yes', 'EmCare.B22.DE37', iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 6 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE31').answer.first().value.code = 'no' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE32').answer.first().value.code = 'no' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE33').answer.first().value.code = 'no' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE34').answer.first().value.code = 'no', 'EmCare.B22.DE38' , iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE35').answer.first().value.code = 'no', 'EmCare.B22.DE39', 'EmCare.B22.DE40') ))
